pages.text: $(item)Candelabras$() are one fancy source of lighting. $(br)They can be lit with a $(item)Flint and Steel$().$(br)When lit, they will repel $(l:bewitchment:creatures/ghost)$(marked)Ghosts$(), preventing them from spawning, with better material increasing the repelling effect.$()$(br2)Additionally, Candelabras can be used as modifiers on $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)$(marked)Altars$().
